Text: ...I think this is probably far enough.

I did leave Violet there, though... Eh, I'm sure
she's fine.
W-Wait, I said...! *pant, pant*
Oh, you ran for it, too?
I had no choice. It's not like I have any money.
True, you did say that.

You really caught me by surprise back there, taking
off running like that... And you deserted me.
Oh... Well, I figured you'd be alright on your own.

Anyway, now that we're safely reunited, let's get
back to the task at hand, huh?

I would certainly like to, but I don't think it's
going to be quite that easy.
Uh, what's that supposed to mean?
Go have a look at the main avenue.
Thief! Somebody catch him!
A thief...?!
That way! I just saw a man run in there!
The alley?! Don't let him get away!
Yaaaaah!!!
Whoa, what's that...?!

That man chasing us... His eyes are crazed, and
there's something not right about him. The townsfolk
have completely transformed, too, almost like he
sparked something in them...!

Yeah, there's definitely somethin' bad in the air.
They're out for blood.

Yes, I believe you're right. So, our first course of
action should be toâ€”
There! It's the thieving bastard!

So that's where he was hiding! Well, you won't get
away again!
Uh-oh... They already found us.
Stay right there!

Oops, this is way too tight here. Let's go back to
the main street.

Good idea. Although I don't think we'll find things
any safer there...!
There he is! Grab the rat! Rip him limb from limb!
Yaaaaaah!
Ack! That was close!

Man, things are just as bad here, too. They say they
wanna catch us, but they seem way more like they're
ready to kill!
Well, I did tell you that it isn't any safer here.

Still, talk about escalating. This all seems way too
sudden.

I suppose this might be the Sanctuary's cores trying
to stop us. They most likely don't want to be broken.

Really? And here I thought this was all about a bit
of dine-and-dashing.
Are you serious?

Your running off without paying provided the
opening, though, I can't deny that. It's just such an
odd way to trigger a response.
Diiieeee!!!
Oh man, that looked like it hurt.

My, you certainly don't hold back even for innocent
townsfolk. You just kicked that man as hard as you
could.
It was self-defense.
That looked nothing short of excessive.

Guess we'll have to agree to disagree on that.
But...what if we have to take all of 'em out?
You may be right.
You bilking sonnuvabiiiitch!!!
Here they come again...!

This is fine, though. I'll just take the handle of
that mop or broom or whatever andâ€”
I'm gonna borrow this for a sec.

Nicely done. Although, I'm sure no mere person on the
street could hope to compete with you.

Yeah well. Not like any of these folks have any
combat training.
There's one thing that's been bothering me, though...
Bastard! You won't get away!!!

You little maggot! You menace to society! Come get
your justice!
It's pretty obvious that they're only after me, huh?!
Oh... Now that you mention it, they are.
Hey, try not to look too concerned nowâ€”
Stop running, you criminal scum!
Agh! Wuh-oh...!
Got you! We caught him, everyone!
Yaaaaaah!!!
Gimme a break already...

Doesn't it seem a little unfair that I'm the one
gettin' all the hate? What's up with that?
Yes, well...
Stop!!!
Ugh, they never give up.
I wonder what it could be... Hmm...
Violet?!
You'll never get past us!

They got us penned in... Why can't you all just get
outta the...way!

I think I know the reason why. It's probably because
this is your memory.

Did you really need to worry about saying that now? I
can tell by your face that you knew that all along.

Hehe, I'm sorry about that. I kind of like seeing you
flustered.
...Oh really.

So...if this is my memory and they're all after me,
then maybe I'm who we need to be looking for?
If we think of how things were with me, then yes.

You should be here somewhere, so we need to find and
defeat you.

But with you, we ran into your memory version right
away.

We've been in here quite a while now, and I'm nowhere
to be seen.
I'm sure you must be in the last place you were.
The last place...

Aha...you mean where I was before I came into this
realm. That would be Lindwurm'sâ€”yeah! The stadium.
Exactly.

Now that we've got that settled, you know what to do,
I assume?
Yeah, get the hell outta here and go find me.

No way I can hold out against this huge of a mob
without magic, so our best bet would to make a good
opening to slip away somehow.
Oh? Well, good luck with that.
Huh...?
I'm going on ahead to the stadium.
Huh? Um, hold on...

It doesn't seem I'll be any use as a distraction,
after all.
Whoa, whoa, whoa, let's notâ€”
See you later!
Man, why does it have be only me... N-Not fair!

Hehe, serves you right for leaving me at the
restaurant.
Okay, I suppose I should be on my way.
